## Proof type

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A set of data that can proof that a key-valu pair exists in a tree with a certain root hash.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Proof = [ProofLeaf, ProofBranch[]];
```
<b>References:</b> [ProofLeaf](./iavl.proofleaf.md)<!-- -->, [ProofBranch](./iavl.proofbranch.md)
